content:
# The Stone Furnace has successfully smelted a total of 6 Iron Plates, and there are no remaining Iron Ore or other ingredients to smelt. 
# The furnace is currently idle with a status of "NO_INGREDIENTS."

# I have achieved my goal of producing Iron Plates! 
# Now, I can extract the Iron Plates from the furnace to add them to my inventory.

# I will extract the Iron Plates from the furnace.
extracted_quantity = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace.position, quantity=6)  # Extracting all 6 Iron Plates.
print(f"Inventory after extraction: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display the updated inventory after extraction.
